headline: L3Harris Lands Grant to Expand Manufacturing in Florida
summary: The new facilities will make space vehicles and satellite constellations, and include a state-of-the-art cleanroom.

headline: L3Harris Is Likely To Benefit From Increased Defense Spending Amid U.S.-China Tensions
summary: L3Harris stands to benefit from global defense spending trends and geopolitical imperatives, despite potential risks. Learn more on LHX stock here.

headline: L3Harris Technologies : Completes Design Review for New Tranche 2 Missile Tracking Satellites
summary: MELBOURNE, Fla., Dec. 10, 2024 - L3Harris Technologies has successfully completed Preliminary Design Review for the development of 18 space vehicles for the Space Development Agency's Tranche 2...
